A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was one of the three best SW movies of all time (episodes 4 and 5 the others). Absolutely brilliant writing\, character development and entertainment. We laughed\, cried and were on the edge of our seats. There were a few unexpected twists and turns and that is hard to do these days. Bravo! It is clear why Disney signed the writer director on to write three new ones. Going to see it again and take some family members this weeekend.
